name: ScreenFooter
description: A flexible footer component that stays at the bottom of the screen with support for various layouts, backgrounds, and keyboard behaviors

props.name: backgroundType
props.description: The background style of the footer [fading, solid, transparent]

props.name: layout
props.description: The layout direction of footer items [horizontal, vertical]

props.name: alignment
props.description: Cross-axis alignment [start, center, end]. In vertical layout: controls horizontal position. In horizontal layout: controls vertical position

props.name: horizontalAlignment
props.description: Main-axis alignment for horizontal layout only when distribution is STACK [start, center, end]

props.name: horizontalItemsDistribution
props.description: Distribution of items in horizontal layout [stack, spread]

props.name: itemsFit
props.description: How items should fit in vertical layout [fit, fixed, stretch]

props.name: keyboardBehavior
props.description: The footer's keyboard behavior [sticky, hoisted]. Sticky: stays at bottom when keyboard opens. Hoisted: pushed up when keyboard opens

props.name: itemWidth
props.description: Fixed width for all items (used with ItemsFit.FIXED)

props.name: visible
props.description: If true, the footer is visible. If false, it slides down

props.name: animationDuration
props.description: Duration of the show/hide animation in ms

props.name: useSafeArea
props.description: If true, the footer will respect the safe area (add bottom padding)

props.name: shadow
props.description: Shadow preset for solid background [sh10, sh20, sh30]. Only applies when backgroundType is 'solid'

props.name: hideDivider
props.description: If true, hides the top divider for solid background. Only applies when backgroundType is 'solid'
